title: Tennessee Titans hosting 'Football 101' charity event
text:
Tennessee Titans hosting 'Football 101' event for women that includes charity silent auction 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/26/15 3:32 am EDT - Updated: 10/26/15 3:32 am EDT 
NASHVILLE, Tennessee â€” The Tennessee Titans are hosting a "Football 101" event for women at the team's headquarters. 
The event begins at 5:30 p.m. Central time Monday and will run through 9:30 p.m. 
Titans assistant head coach for defense Dick LeBeau will conduct a film session during the event. Mike Keith, the radio voice of the Titans, also is scheduled to speak. 
Following a dinner in the team's dining facility and an autograph session with select Titans players, women can participate in a scrimmage coached by Titans rookies. 
The event includes a silent auction benefiting the Tennessee Breast Cancer Coalition, an organization dedicated to improving the quality of life for breast cancer patients. Last year's event raised over $40,000 for the organization.

Online: http://www.titansonline.com/football101 .
